entry.title: Pretty When You Lie
entry.summary:
Author: Binbin_bean

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,215Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Chan owns a cozy little café called “Home Brew.” It’s the kind of place where people overshare their lives between sips of coffee. Everyone adores Chan — kind, soft-spoken, always remembering customers’ orders — but Minho sees something off.Because Minho isn’t there for coffee.He’s there undercover.There have been a series of slow, subtle poisonings in the area, all linked to drinks or pastries from that same café — though no proof has ever surfaced. Minho, a detective who prides himself on reading people, is assigned to investigate.Except… Chan doesn’t act like a killer. He’s warm. He’s lonely. And when he looks at Minho, there’s recognition. Something quiet and dangerous.As Minho gets closer, the story teeters between affection and suspicion — are the smiles real, or bait? And when the final cup is poured, Minho realizes he’s in too deep: in love, or in danger — maybe both.Or: A detective walks into a café to catch a killer.He ends up falling for the man who might be one.

entry.title: Come basckstage!
entry.summary:
Author: Wolffics

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,158Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: You waited six long months for the night that felt more like a dream than reality — front row at a Stray Kids concert, close enough to feel the bass in your bones and watch Bang Chan breathe the same air as you. You’d always been just another fan in the crowd… until the moment his eyes found yours. One glance becomes a second. A smile becomes a wink. And a coincidence becomes something far more dangerous when a staff member taps your shoulder after the show with a message that sends your world spinning: Bang Chan wants to see you backstage. Tonight, the distance between idol and fan disappears. Tonight, he chooses you.

entry.title: Not Just An NDA
entry.summary:
Author: ApparentlyStray

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,515Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 9

Summary: At some point during the show, Rose had bumped Chris's shoulder and apologized. Not much later, while keeping his eyes focused on the stage, Chris reached his hand out and touched Rose’s hand, hoping it came off as an accident. Rose froze when she felt his hand against her own. He definitely lingered more than an accidental bump. Swallowing, Rose extended her fingers and grazed Chris's hand. Rose was still having a hard time wrapping her mind around the fact that these world famous K-Pop idols were the ones to reach out to her. There were already a bunch of what ifs forming in Rose’s mind. Rose had spent the better part of the past few years obsessed with the man beside her and his group. How could she do anything, but take the chance and get to know them.   This is my first fic on AO3 and my first SKZ fic. It started as a "what if" and one shots bounced around with friends, but I decided to actually post it after being told to write it down. This fic will focus on Rose (OC)/ Bang Chan's relationship with some other background relationships.

entry.title: Fires in the Dark Part 3
entry.summary:
Author: Thislaptopishot

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,177Chapters: 10/25Kudos: 7

Summary: Back from three unforgettable weeks in Seoul, Kat is carrying more than just memories. Between the glow of new bonds, the pull of old feelings, and a growing unease she can’t ignore, the return to Johannesburg feels heavier than she imagined. With Amy by her side, she’s forced to confront a truth she isn’t ready to share, one that could change everything between her and Chan. But some decisions can’t be postponed forever… and some confessions have a way of breaking more than they heal.
